rules_text:
Trample, haste
Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, you may return Olten Sandwurm to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
[i]“Ain't no sound but the sound of my feet, and this thing still finds me.”
—Lieutenant Saxon[/i]
notes:
